sentences.sContent: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.sCn: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.sContent: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.sCn: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

sentences.sContent: ...one has to wonder why don’t we apply the same social norms to checking phones during meals...
...It’s no wonder that device we buy has a plug on the end of it or a wireless connection to internet soon...
...No wonder parents worry their own kids might spin out of control once they hit the turbulent waters of adolescence...
...No wonder only 13% of employees worldwide feel engaged in their occupation...
...Many consumers wonder about the necessity of having their fitness monitored...
...it is no wonder that China has been one of the most favored places for overseas students...
...The electronic industry is maturing even though no wonder products hit the market...
...I wonder what’s happened to our train...
...Scientists also wonder why some paintings were done in areas that are so difficult to get to...
...I wonder what they are protesting against...
...leaving our descendants to wonder how creature so ugly could have won so much affection...
...For those parents who wonder how and when they should start allowing their kids more freedom...

phrases.pCn: 对…感到奇怪；对…感到疑惑
创造奇迹；产生奇妙作用
神奇女侠；神力女超人；神奇女郎（电视剧）
[古语] …得令人惊叹，…得叫人惊异

words.tran: 奇妙的；令人惊奇的；非常的
奇境，仙境；非常奇妙的地方

trans.tranOther: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc
